sample_001.txt.tldr: The Q4 planning meeting prioritized mobile app development and SSO implementation. Speaker B will lead the mobile app project, targeting a beta launch by end of December, while Speaker C will own SSO implementation, aiming for completion by November 30th. Speaker D will audit the outdated authentication service this week, identified as a risk. A progress review meeting is scheduled for December 10th at 2:00 PM.

decisions.decision: Mobile app development is the top priority for Q4.
Enterprise features, specifically SSO, will also be a key focus.
Speaker B will lead the mobile app project.
Speaker C will own the SSO implementation.
The mobile app beta launch is targeted for the end of December.
SSO implementation is targeted for completion by November 30th.
Speaker D will audit the current authentication service.
A checkpoint meeting will be held on December 10th at 2:00 PM to review progress.

action_items.task: Lead the mobile app development project.
Have a detailed spec ready for the mobile app.
Own the SSO implementation.
Help Speaker C on the backend authentication for SSO.
Audit the authentication service.

meetings_to_schedule.title: Q4 Mobile App & SSO Progress Review
meetings_to_schedule.description: Checkpoint meeting to review mobile app spec and SSO progress

risks: Our current authentication service is outdated.

sample_002.txt.tldr: The team conducted a sprint retrospective, noting successful story point completion and improved code quality, but identified slow code reviews as an area for improvement. They decided to implement a 24-hour review target and addressed blockers for the next sprint, including needing vendor API keys and a database upgrade. Sprint planning for next week was scheduled for December 12th.

decisions.decision: Set a 24-hour code review target.

action_items.task: Document the 24-hour code review target in the team handbook.
Email the vendor to follow up on API keys.
Create a proposal for the database upgrade.
Send the calendar invite for sprint planning.

meetings_to_schedule.title: Sprint Planning
meetings_to_schedule.description: Sprint planning meeting for the next sprint

risks: Code reviews are taking too long, with some PRs sitting for 3 days.
Need API keys from the vendor, which is a blocker for the next sprint.
Database upgrade is needed due to performance risks.

sample_003.txt.tldr: The team provided updates on current tasks: Speaker B encountered a blocker with payment integration's webhook validation and will schedule a vendor call. Speaker C completed the authentication module, ready for review. Speaker D is migrating the database schema and will test it thoroughly before completion tomorrow, with Speaker C tasked to review the migration script.

decisions.decision: Speaker B will schedule a vendor call for the payment integration webhook validation blocker.
Speaker A will review Speaker C's authentication module.
Speaker C will review Speaker D's database migration script.
The team will aim to ship 'this feature' by Friday.

action_items.task: Schedule a vendor call for webhook validation.
Review Speaker C's completed authentication module.
Review Speaker D's database migration script.
Test the new database schema migration thoroughly in staging.

meetings_to_schedule.title: Vendor Call - Webhook Validation
meetings_to_schedule.description: Call with vendor to resolve webhook validation blocker for payment integration

risks: Blocker with webhook validation for payment integration.
Risk to project timeline due to webhook validation blocker.

sample_004.txt.tldr: The roadmap planning meeting prioritized Q4 initiatives based on customer feedback, focusing on SSO, basic analytics, and mobile web improvements. SSO was identified as the top priority, with Speaker B as product lead and Speaker D as technical lead, and a detailed project plan due Monday. Risks concerning team capacity and potential SSO blockers led to a 2-week buffer for SSO, and a stakeholder demo for SSO progress is scheduled for December 18th.

decisions.decision: SSO is the clear first priority for Q4.
SSO project approved with an estimated effort of 6 weeks with two engineers for SAML and OAuth.
Speaker B designated as Product Lead for the SSO project.
Speaker D designated as Technical Lead for the SSO project.
Analytics will follow a phased approach: basic reporting in Q4, advanced in Q1.
Mobile support will focus on improving mobile web in Q4, deferring native app development to Q1.
Q4 priorities are finalized as SSO, basic analytics, and mobile web improvements.
A 2-week buffer will be added for the SSO project.

action_items.task: Prepare the spec for the SSO project.
Present three options for analytics.
Handle mobile web improvements.
Create a detailed project plan for SSO.
Prepare the technical demo for the SSO stakeholder demo.
Prepare product overview slides for the SSO stakeholder demo.

meetings_to_schedule.title: Stakeholder Demo
meetings_to_schedule.description: Stakeholder demo to show SSO progress

risks: The team might be stretched too thin with only 4 engineers to handle Q4 priorities.
If SSO hits blockers, other planned projects could slip.

sample_005.txt.tldr: The team conducted a design review for Speaker B's new navigation system, which offers a clearer hierarchy, improved mobile responsiveness, and faster load times. The sidebar design was approved, with Speaker D assigned to lead implementation targeting November 15th completion. Speaker C will work with Speaker B on a user testing plan, with sessions scheduled for mid-December.

decisions.decision: Approved and decided to move forward with Speaker B's new navigation system design.
Speaker D will own the implementation of the new navigation system.
Speaker C will work with Speaker B on the user testing plan for the new navigation system.

action_items.task: Implement the new navigation system.
Work with Speaker B on the user testing plan for the new navigation system.
Prepare the user testing plan.
Recruit test participants for user testing sessions.
Send calendar invites for user testing sessions.

meetings_to_schedule.title: User Testing Session 1
meetings_to_schedule.description: First user testing session for the new navigation system

meetings_to_schedule.title: User Testing Session 2
meetings_to_schedule.description: Second user testing session for the new navigation system

risks: Breaking existing functionality during the implementation of the new navigation system.
